answers.answer: Do you have a specific question? Are you Type 1? Are you on insulin? Do you see a doctor? You really didn't give any information in your post for us to be able to help.

Without knowing your details, best way I could say to manage your diabetes is to visit your gp and diabetes educator regularly, get as much information as you possibly can about your  particular circumstances and follow medical advice.
